conv.text: Greetings, King of Athens. I come to you in search of the truth behind the death of Galois. Do you know anything about it?

answers.option: Yes, I have heard stories of a powerful being targeting mathematicians for centuries.
No, I'm afraid I don't know anything about it.

conv.text: The only way to defeat this being is to find a powerful weapon. Do you know where I can find such a weapon?

answers.option: Yes, I know of a blacksmith who can create such a weapon.
No, I'm afraid I don't know where to find such a weapon.

conv.text: I'm sorry I cannot help you. Goodbye.
Very well. I wish you luck in your quest. Goodbye.
I'm sorry I cannot help you. Goodbye.
